def sumer(no):
    return ((no)**2+(no))/2
t_cases = int(raw_input())

for i in xrange(t_cases):
    values = (raw_input()).split(" ")
    n=int(values[0])
    k=int(values[1])
    h_shakes = 0
    
    if k==0 or n==k :
        h_shakes+= sumer(n-1)   
    else:
        h_shakes +=sumer(n-1) - (n-k)
        
    print h_shakes
